Retrieved 2012-3-4. ==History== The club formed from a merger of two football clubs ; ALO's Hokuriku and YKK AP in 2008. ==League position== *2008 : Football League - 3rd *2009 : J2 League - 13th *2010 : J2 League - 18th *2011 : J2 League - 16th *2012 : J2 League - 19th *2013 : J2 League - 18th *2014 : J2 League - 22nd *2015 : J3 League - 5th *2016 : J3 League - 6th *2017 : J3 League - 8th *2018 : J3 League - 11th *2019 : J3 League - 4th *2020 : J3 League - 9th ===ALO's Hokuriku=== *2000 : Football League - 8th *2001 : Football League - 15th *2002 : Football League - 14th *2003 : Football League - 14th *2004 : Football League - 10th *2005 : Football League - 3rd *2006 : Football League - 8th *2007 : Football League - 4th ===YKK AP=== *2001 : Football League - 6th *2002 : Football League - 8th *2003 : Football League - 6th *2004 : Football League - 4th *2005 : Football League - 2nd *2006 : Football League - 4th *2007 : Football League - 6th ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Kataller Toyama players == References == ==Other websites== * Kataller Toyama website * J.League Club Guide Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Toyama Prefecture
